definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
holy land (of a religion)/sacred place/shrine/holy city (such as Jerusalem, Mecca etc)/center of historic interest
St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil
Santiago, capital of Chile/San Diego, California
saint/sage/refers to Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]/the current reigning Emperor

sentences.english: For example, scarabs in the form of the beetle insect were believed to be the symbol of new life.
sentences.chinese: 例如，甲殼蟲外形的聖甲蟲被認爲是新生的象徵。

sentences.english: The Egyptian sacred scarab is a dung beetle.
sentences.chinese: 埃及聖甲蟲其實就是蜣螂。

sentences.english: A third text is Gherand Samhita by the great sage Gherand .
sentences.chinese: 第三部是聖人格蘭達所著的《格蘭達集》。

sentences.english: I'm a resident of Rose Park on St. Johnson Street.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個居住在聖約翰遜街玫瑰花園的居民。

sentences.english: It scars the face of the sanctuary.
Gasic thinks he's found the answer--in San Rafael, Argentina.
sentences.chinese: Gasic認爲他在阿根廷的聖拉菲爾找到了答案。

sentences.english: He inherited Flor on first coming to the St. Gregory.
sentences.chinese: 他一到聖格雷戈裏飯店就留用了弗洛拉。

sentences.english: We must send her to St. Mungo's. She's... she's dying, Severus...
sentences.chinese: 我們必須送她去聖芒戈。

sentences.english: The saint dinner table substituted for the sacrificial altar, choir's position has been ordinary is meeting audiences' right hand side.
sentences.chinese: 聖餐桌取代了祭壇，唱詩班的位置一般在會衆的右首。

sentences.english: Notice Jesus talks about God’s name being holy.
sentences.chinese: 注意主耶穌說到的是神的名被遵爲聖。

sentences.english: All the days of his separation he is holy unto the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 在他離俗的日子，他都是歸耶和華爲聖的。

sentences.english: St. Joseph lighthouse after a winter storm.
Model your thoughts after the Psalmists of old.
sentences.chinese: 在舊約聖歌唱完之後讓你的思想成形。

sentences.english: The target paladin loses his Divine Grace bonuses for one round.
sentences.chinese: 目標聖武士將在這一輪內失去他的神恩獎勵。

sentences.english: We continued our walk in the small town St. Ulrich.
sentences.chinese: 我們繼續步行於聖烏爾立赫小鎮。

sentences.english: To the west of the mountains is San Joaquin Valley, the southern half of the Central Valley.
sentences.chinese: 西面的山嶺是聖華金河谷，中央大峽谷的南半部分。

definition: saint/sage/refers to Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]/the current reigning Emperor
ode/eulogy/to praise in writing/to wish (in letters)
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
archaic variant of 蘇|苏[su1]/to revive
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
